name: A Study on the Degraded Digital Moving Image

metadata.name: ddmi-01
metadata.description:
A Study on the Degraded Digital Moving Image
ddmi-01

1080 × 720, mp4
00:52
sound


footage from the film "The Housemaid (Kim Ki-young, 1960)" 
film copyright expired



The scenes on the stairs of the movie are collected and reconstructed. Each scene's frame has mixed regularly or irregularly to create a new rhythm. Excessively zoomed screen and adjusted speed make mechanical and spasmodic movements. It also continued to delay the process of characters' actions through excessive repetition and suspension. And the glitch, which appears by making defects in video files, reveals the materiality of digital images and makes people recognize machines.
